_header: Into this world this day did come
_description: A song of the Nativity — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘I pray you be mery & synge with me / In worship of cristys nativite’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
In to this world this day dide comIhesu Criste bothe God &
                    man…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…But pray we þat we may be theder browghtWher riches ys
                    everlastynglyExplicit
